notes: v32 tail inequality constants for an optional sanity-check certificate.
All values are decimal strings to avoid JSON float roundoff.
Intervals are interpreted as closed [lo, hi].
m_band=[10, 1e18] and alpha_band=[0,1] are checked via worst-case endpoint evaluation inside the generator.
eta is chosen extremely small (eta=1e-20) so that the inequality holds with large slack even under conservative constants.
